entry.title: Fix a harmonica tab's bugs
entry.content:
Skeeter’s song The end of the world is a beautiful song. I want to play is with my harmonica. So I find id by startpage.

And there is a tab on harptabs.

It is a site to index a lot of harmonica tabs, and it is easy to use and kepp the KISS rule.

The tab is here

The tab by aussie

But this is something wrong with it.

So I find the bugs and fix them.

And submit a new The end of the world harmonica tab
